searchDocs.title: ConfigType​
searchDocs.content: </> type ConfigType = "Truck" | "Package" | "City" The type of the config.

searchDocs.title: TruckType​
searchDocs.content: </> type TruckType = "Pickup" | "Truck" | "Van" | "MegaTruck" The type of the truck.

searchDocs.title: TruckConfig​
searchDocs.content: </> type TruckConfig = { Price: number, Capacity: number, Speed: number, Icon: string } The truck's config.

searchDocs.title: PackageType​
searchDocs.content: </> type PackageType = "Common" | "Rare" | "Epic" The type of the package.

searchDocs.title: PackageConfig​
searchDocs.content: </> type PackageConfig = { Weight: number, DefaultPrice: number, Chance: number, Icon: string } The package's config.

searchDocs.title: CityType​
searchDocs.content: </> type CityType = "Yellow" | "Blue" | "Green" | "Red" The type of the city.

searchDocs.title: CityConfig​
searchDocs.content: </> type CityConfig = {SpawnCooldown: number} The city's config. INFO The SpawnCooldown is in seconds, how long it takes to spawn a package.

searchDocs.title: HeadquartersConfig​
searchDocs.content: </> type HeadquartersConfig = { Income: number, PackageCapacity: number, TruckCapacity: number, Price: number } The headquarter's config at its current level. INFO The Income is per second.

searchDocs.title: IslandType​
searchDocs.content: </> type IslandType = "IslandTemplate" The type of the island.

searchDocs.title: ID​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.ID: number The identification property of the island.

searchDocs.title: Owner​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Owner: Player | {UserId: number} The owner of the island. If the island is not owned by a player, this property is equal to the table {UserId = 0}.

searchDocs.title: OwnedByPlayer​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.OwnedByPlayer: boolean True when the the island is owned by a player and false otherwise.

searchDocs.title: Loaded​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Loaded: boolean True when the island is spawned and prepared (with everything loaded) and false otherwise. Turns false after the island is destroyed. TIP Useful to check when the island needs to be fully loaded or fully destroyed before continuing.

searchDocs.title: Destroyed​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Destroyed: boolean Turns true right before the island is destroyed. TIP Useful to check when the island needs to be fully working or in the process of loading before continuing. Good to pair with IslandServer.Loaded.

searchDocs.title: Perms​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only unreleased </> IslandServer.Perms: {Player } Holds the players that have perms to edit the island. Contains the owner. WARNING This property isn't implemented yet. It currently has no use.

searchDocs.title: Model​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Model: IslandModel? Reference to the workspace model of the island, if one exists (if the island is spawned).

searchDocs.title: HQConfig​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.HQConfig: ConfigTypes.HeadquartersConfig The config of the island at its current level.

searchDocs.title: Nodes​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Nodes: {[ID]: NodeServer} A table of the NodeServer instances that the island contains.

searchDocs.title: Roads​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Roads: {[ID]: RoadServer} A table of the RoadServer instances that the island contains.

searchDocs.title: Trucks​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Trucks: {[ID]: TruckServer} A table of the TruckServer instances that the island contains.

searchDocs.title: Packages​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Packages: {[ID]: PackageServer} A table of the PackageServer instances that the island contains.

searchDocs.title: Cities​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Cities: {[ID]: CityServer} A table of the CityServer instances that the island contains.

searchDocs.title: HQNode​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.HQNode: NodeServer? The node that is associated with the island's HQ. This property is nil until the island spawns.

searchDocs.title: DestroyJanitor​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.DestroyJanitor: Janitor  Gets cleaned up once the island is being destroyed. IslandServer.DestroyJanitor:Add(RunService.Heartbeat:Connect(function(dt) -- code end), "Disconnect") TIP :Add() connections and instances that need to be cleaned up (destroyed/disconnected) when the island gets destroyed to battle memory leaks. INFO The first argument is the item that needs to be cleaned up and the second argument is the method invoked for cleaning up. For instances and default roblox connections, the second argument can be omitted and determined automatically.

searchDocs.title: HQLevel​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.HQLevel: number The current level of the HQ.

searchDocs.title: Cash​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.Cash: number How much cash the island currently has.

searchDocs.title: TotalCash​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.TotalCash: number How much cash the island earned in total over its lifetime.

searchDocs.title: TotalPackages​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.TotalPackages: number How many packages were delivered on this island.

searchDocs.title: TimePlayed​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> IslandServer.TimePlayed: number For how long the island is spawned.

searchDocs.title: GetClosestNode​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetClosestNode( position: Vector3 ,-- The position from which the distance is determined maxDistance: number?-- If specified, it takes only objects in the maxDistance distance into consideration ) → NodeServer? Returns the closest node from the position.

searchDocs.title: GetClosestRoad​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetClosestRoad( position: Vector3 ,-- The position from which the distance is determined maxDistance: number?-- If specified, it takes only objects in the maxDistance distance into consideration ) → { Road: RoadServer, Point: Vector3 } Returns the closest road from the position. INFO The Point in returns is the closest point on the road to the provided position.

searchDocs.title: GetTrucksInHQ​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetTrucksInHQ() → {[ID]: TruckServer} Returns the trucks that are currently present in the HQ, and therefore not traveling.

searchDocs.title: GetPackagesInHQ​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetPackagesInHQ() → {[ID]: PackageServer} Returns the packages that are currently present in the HQ.

searchDocs.title: GetCityFromNode​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetCityFromNode(node: NodeServer) → CityServer? Returns the city the provided node is associated with, if there is one.

searchDocs.title: GetTruckCount​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetTruckCount() → number Returns how many trucks are currently present on the entire island. This includes both trucks in HQ and trucks that are traveling.

searchDocs.title: GetHQPackageCount​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetHQPackageCount() → number Returns the number of packages that are currently present in the HQ.

searchDocs.title: Spawn​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:Spawn() → () Spawns the island and loads everything onto it including cities, roads, etc. Also starts spawning packages and changes the ReplicationFocus of the island's owner.

searchDocs.title: HasPerms​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:HasPerms(player: Player ) → boolean Returns whether the provide player has perms on the island.

searchDocs.title: UpdateHQLevel​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:UpdateHQLevel( level: number-- The new level ) → () Changes the HQ level.

searchDocs.title: AdjustCash​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AdjustCash( delta: number-- By what amount should the cash be changed ) → () Changes the cash amount on the island. TIP Use this every time you want to adjust the player's cash. Using other ways may result in unexpected behavior.

searchDocs.title: AdjustTotalPackages​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AdjustTotalPackages( delta: number-- By what amount should the total packages be changed ) → () Changes the total delivered packages stat on the island.

searchDocs.title: AdjustTimePlayed​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AdjustTimePlayed( delta: number-- By what amount should the time played be changed ) → () Changes the time played stat on the island.

searchDocs.title: AddNode​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AddNode(node: NodeServer) → () Adds the provided node on the island.

searchDocs.title: AddRoad​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AddRoad(road: RoadServer) → () Adds the provided road on the island.

searchDocs.title: AddTruck​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AddTruck(truck: TruckServer) → () Adds the provided truck on the island.

searchDocs.title: AddPackage​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AddPackage(package: PackageServer) → () Adds the provided package on the island.

searchDocs.title: AddCity​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:AddCity(city: CityServer) → () Adds the provided city on the island.

searchDocs.title: RemoveNode​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:RemoveNode(node: NodeServer) → () Removes the provided node from the island.

searchDocs.title: RemoveRoad​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:RemoveRoad(road: RoadServer) → () Removes the provided road from the island.

searchDocs.title: RemoveTruck​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:RemoveTruck(truck: TruckServer) → () Removes the provided truck from the island.

searchDocs.title: RemovePackage​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:RemovePackage(package: PackageServer) → () Removes the provided package from the island.

searchDocs.title: RemoveCity​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:RemoveCity(city: CityServer) → () Removes the provided city from the island.

searchDocs.title: SellTruck​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:SellTruck(truck: TruckServer) → () Sells the truck. The truck gets removed from the island and the island is rewarded with some money back.

searchDocs.title: GetStats​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetStats() → IslandStats

interface IslandStats { HQLevel: number-- The current HQ level Cash: number-- The current cash on the island TotalCash: number-- The total earned cash on the island TotalPackages: number-- The total number of delivered packages TimePlayed: number-- The total time the island has been spawned for }  Returns the stats of the island.

searchDocs.title: GetIDs​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:GetIDs() → IslandIDs

interface IslandIDs { Node: {number}-- A list of the IDs of all the nodes present on the island Road: {number}-- A list of the IDs of all the roads present on the island Truck: {number}-- A list of the IDs of all the trucks present on the island Package: {number}-- A list of the IDs of all the packages present on the island City: {number}-- A list of the IDs of all the cities present on the island }  Returns the IDs of all objects located on the island.

searchDocs.title: ReplicateAll​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:ReplicateAll(players: {[Player ]: true}) → () Replicates all objects located on the island to the provided set of players.

searchDocs.title: SaveWholeIsland​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:SaveWholeIsland() → () Saves the whole island to the owner's DataStore.

searchDocs.title: Destroy​
searchDocs.content: </> IslandServer:Destroy() → () Destroys the whole island and every object that is located on it.
